attributes.additional_details:
We have families in Syria, and always have worries about them and same for other Syrians who are in a similar situation.
Lifting the sanctions allows Syrians to live in a better humanitarian conditions, and  provides external aid to help them to survive in this tragic situation, get the healthcare they need, rebuild the infra structure and collapsed buildings, resulting of both of the war and the earthquake.
Syrians expect from the international community to lift sanctions on innocent Syrians
attributes.background:
Sanctions were imposed on Syrian people during the war resulting in lack of all power and water resources and Healthcare, increased poverty and people are suffering because they can’t secure the minimum life needs.
Several catastrophic Earthquakes occurred adding extreme physical and mental agony.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/632889
